sentences: After informal consultations in plenary, resulting in two amendments in the text, the SBI adopted conclusions and forwarded a draft decision to COP 20 (FCCC/SBI/2014/L.43).
Malawi, for the LDCs, supported by JAMAICA, proposed referring to the decision as the 'Lima Work Programme on Gender'.
JAMAICA stated that the proposed actions should be guided by gender equality, not merely gender balance.
Welcoming the decision, MEXICO noted it attaches utmost importance to the issue.
